name: Garden Joy
description:
It’s time to bring your gardening dreams to life! Garden Joy is all about designing the garden of your dreams as you play and learn about plants, seasons, and outdoor design. Have fun and relax while you design stunning settings from locations all over the world, using beautiful, real-life plants, décor, and landscaping materials.

As your dream designs come to life, you’ll get feedback from other players through voting. After submitting your design, you can win exciting, in-game rewards like Coins, Diamonds, and various items to personalize your garden.

Transform your outdoor space by customizing every detail. Choose from your favorite plants, trees, walkways and even fauna, such as butterflies. There are countless ways to explore your creativity, so get ready to unlock your inner designer!
